医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明饮酒量增加直接增加痴呆风险研究表明，由遗传因素驱动的较高饮酒量与痴呆风险增加相关，这挑战了适度饮酒可能具有保护作用的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Study-shows-increased-alcohol-conspiration-directly-raises-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Study-shows-increased-alcohol-conspiration-directly-raises-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4eb2303e-62d5-40a0-8158-b4e932aa37be Sun, 08 Sep 2024 22:41:00 -0400 Study shows increased alcohol consumption directly raises dementia risk
生白大蒜有望促进心脏健康和降低疾病风险审查强调了食用生白大蒜的潜在健康益处，特别是在改善心脏代谢生物标志物和降低慢性疾病风险方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Raw-white-garlic-shows-promise-in-boosting-heart-health-and-reducing-disease-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Raw-white-garlic-shows-promise-in-boosting-heart-health-and-reducing-disease-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6afbd5db-9095-4543-bf2d-dd3c2d79774b Sun, 08 Sep 2024 22:19:00 -0400 Raw white garlic shows promise in boosting heart health and reducing disease risks
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 为突破性器官移植研究提供数百万美元资助寺崎生物医学创新研究所的研究人员获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的数百万美元拨款，用于推进器官移植和抗体介导的排斥反应的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/NIH-awards-multi-million-grant-for-groundwriting-organ-transplantation-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/NIH-awards-multi-million-grant-for-groundwriting-organ-transplantation-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78a8e752-0d94-400e-8e1a-452bb1119a7d Fri, 06 Sep 2024 23:57:00 -0400 NIH awards multi-million grant for groundbreaking organ transplantation research
研究表明认知行为疗法可导致抑郁症患者大脑发生变化认知行为疗法是抑郁症最常见的治疗方法之一，可以教授应对日常麻烦的技能，强化健康的行为并对抗消极的想法。但改变想法和行为能导致大脑持久变化吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-shows-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-can-lead-to-brain-changes-in-depression-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-shows-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-can-lead-to-brain-changes-in-depression-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=259cb4a2-ce73-434a-96b1-5fc79c70a374 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 23:53:00 -0400 Study shows cognitive behavioral therapy can lead to brain changes in depression patients
瑜伽和伸展运动可以缓解老年女性的尿失禁8 月 27 日发表在《内科医学年鉴》上的一项新研究显示，患有尿失禁的老年女性可以从定期的低强度运动中受益，其中瑜伽以及伸展运动和力量训练都显示出益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Yoga-and-stretching-offer-relief-for-urinary-incontinence-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Yoga-and-stretching-offer-relief-for-urinary-incontinence-in-older-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66b58e08-083f-47cb-bca5-e18c19f7bd96 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 23:46:00 -0400 Yoga and stretching offer relief for urinary incontinence in older women
先进的成像技术可深入了解大脑微观结构和疾病检测在一项新研究中，研究人员使用两种先进的成像技术比较了人类脑干中神经纤维的方向：基于扩散磁共振成像（dMRI）的纤维束成像和偏振敏感光学相干断层扫描（PS-OCT）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Advanced-imaging-techniques-offer-insights-into-brain-microstruct-and-disease-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Advanced-imaging-techniques-offer-insights-into-brain-microstruct-and-disease-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd013941-d8a0-4bc5-b075-816b3e855e7a Fri, 06 Sep 2024 23:39:05 -0400 Advanced imaging techniques offer insights into brain microstructure and disease detection
与阿尔茨海默病风险相关的大脑变化可能会增加老年人的财务脆弱性南加州大学多恩西夫文学、艺术与科学学院的研究人员领导的一项首次研究表明，更容易遭受金融诈骗的老年人的大脑变化可能与患阿尔茨海默病的风险较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Brain-changes-lated-to-Alzheimers-risk-may-increase-financial-vulnerability-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Brain-changes-lated-to-Alzheimers-risk-may-increase-financial-vulnerability-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a11c278-a7b5-4808-b235-70e44f99a27e Fri, 06 Sep 2024 23:01:48 -0400 Brain changes related to Alzheimer's risk may increase financial vulnerability in seniors
用于研究抑郁症模型中血清素的荧光探针抑郁症中的血清素与诊断、治疗和药物开发高度相关。为了更好地研究这一领域，中国团队现已开发出一种用于成像过程的荧光探针，该探针对血清素具有高度敏感性和选择性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/A-florescent-probe-for-stuying-serotonin-in-depression-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/A-florescent-probe-for-stuying-serotonin-in-depression-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2792bd3-3e7e-4ee2-aa0d-fea8f17f21c5 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 14:53:00 -0400 A fluorescent probe for studying serotonin in depression models
了解转录因子在基因表达中的合作我们体内的每个细胞都含有相同的 DNA，但肝细胞与脑细胞不同，皮肤细胞与肌肉细胞不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Understanding-the-cooperation-of-transcription-factors-in-gene-express.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Understanding-the-cooperation-of-transcription-factors-in-gene-express.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b37dc587-52e0-4f48-9403-c3561f17da1a Fri, 06 Sep 2024 14:45:00 -0400 Understanding the cooperation of transcription factors in gene expression
突破性技术使体内器官清晰可见研究人员开发了一种观察体内器官的新方法，使覆盖的组织对可见光透明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Breakthrough-technique-enables-clear-visualization-of-organs-in-the-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Breakthrough-technique-enables-clear-visualization-of-organs-in-the-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=369bc306-4eba-4a11-a514-6477d810f552 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 14:38:00 -0400 Breakthrough technique enables clear visualization of organs in the body
